translations: （从地下）挖掘，挖出；发掘，揭露；从洞中赶出（动物，尤指狐狸）（unearth 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.sentence: More human remains have been unearthed in the north.
sentences.translation: 更多人类遗骸在北方挖掘出土。

sentences.sentence: Fossil hunters have unearthed the bones of an elephant believed to be 500,000 years old.
sentences.translation: 化石寻找者们挖掘出了一头被认为有50万年之久的大象遗骨。

sentences.sentence: I unearthed my old diaries when we moved house.
sentences.translation: 我们搬家时，我偶然发现了自己的旧日记。
